org.zodiark.service

Interface Session<T extends Endpoint>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PublisherServiceImpl, SubscriberServiceImpl

    public interface Session<T extends Endpoint>
    A Endpoint Session for a Publisher, Susbcriber or Wowza remote client.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T config(Envelope e)
      Invoke the remote database/web service and retrieve the data associated with the Endpoint
      void createOrJoinStreamingSession(Envelope e)
      Create or join a Streaming Session.

      Create the PublisherEndpoint Streaming Session.
      void error(Envelope e, T endpoint, Message m)
      Write an error response back to the remote Endpoint

      Write a response back to the remote Endpoint

    • Method Detail

      • createSession

        T createSession(Envelope e,
              org.atmosphere.cpr.AtmosphereResource resource)
        Create the PublisherEndpoint Streaming Session. The validation phase will imply calling the remote database/web service to load in memory the publisher/subscriber data. The Endpoint will be called upon success or failure of creating the session.
        Parameters:
        e - an Envelope
        resource - a AtmosphereResource
        Returns:
        An implementation of Endpoint

      • config

        T config(Envelope e)
        Invoke the remote database/web service and retrieve the data associated with the Endpoint
        Parameters:
        e - an Envelope received from a remote Endpoint
        Returns:
        the Endpoint

      • error

        void error(Envelope e,
         T endpoint,
         Message m)
        Write an error response back to the remote Endpoint
        Parameters:
        e - an Envelope
        endpoint - a Endpoint
        m - a Message

      • createOrJoinStreamingSession

        void createOrJoinStreamingSession(Envelope e)
        Create or join a Streaming Session. The Session will be created if the Endpoint is a Publisher, and joined if the endpoint is a Subscriber. Implementation of this method must make sure the Wowza Server will allow the Endpoint to create or Join the session.
        Parameters:
        e - an Envelope from the Endpoint

      • startStreamingSession

        void startStreamingSession(Envelope e)
        Start the streaming session. This method will be called by the remote endpoint upon successful completion of createSession(org.zodiark.protocol.Envelope, org.atmosphere.cpr.AtmosphereResource) and createOrJoinStreamingSession(org.zodiark.protocol.Envelope)
        Parameters:
        e - an Envelope from a remote Endpoint

      • response

        void response(Envelope e,
            T endpoint,
            Message m)
        Write a response back to the remote Endpoint
        Parameters:
        e - an Envelope
        endpoint - a Endpoint
        m - a Message

      • terminateStreamingSession

        void terminateStreamingSession(T endpoint,
                             org.atmosphere.cpr.AtmosphereResource r)
        Terminate the streaming session.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - The Endpoint
        r - The associated AtmosphereResource

      • errorStreamingSession

        void errorStreamingSession(Envelope e)
        Handle a failed request for opening a streaming session
        Parameters:
        e - An Envelope containing the failed response from Wowza
